name: Jelly Thief's
description:
You need to defend the diamond from the Jelly cubes that want to destroy it. Run and look for the diamond, before it's too late.

W/A/S/D - To Move 

Space - To Jump 

Left Mouse - To Shoot

I hope you have fun and do not forget if that is the case give me a review and share it with your friends.
The game at this point has only one level available which is an island. If you want the game continues, let me know in the comments. I am learning to program and model in 3D, if you find a bug it will be divided due to lack of experience.
Thanks, 

Dream'Studio
